name: raycast-ocr
title: OCR Text Recognition
description: Extract text from images using macOS Vision API
author: moguw

commands.name: ocr-from-clipboard
commands.title: OCR from Clipboard
commands.description: Recognize text from image in clipboard

commands.name: configure-ocr
commands.title: Configure OCR
commands.description: View and configure OCR backend settings

preferences.name: ocrBackend
preferences.title: OCR Backend
preferences.description: Choose which OCR engine to use

preferences.name: openaiApiKey
preferences.title: OpenAI API Key
preferences.description: Your OpenAI API key (only needed for OpenAI backend)

preferences.name: openaiModel
preferences.title: Model Name
preferences.description: OpenAI model to use for OCR

preferences.name: openaiDetail
preferences.title: Image Detail Level
preferences.description: Higher detail = better OCR accuracy but slower and more expensive

preferences.name: geminiApiKey
preferences.title: Gemini API Key
preferences.description: Your Google Gemini API key (only needed for Gemini backend)

preferences.name: geminiModel
preferences.title: Gemini Model
preferences.description: Gemini model to use for OCR

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`pnpm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`pnpm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
